roleset.name: pour liquid from bottle into pitcher
roleset.note: DECANT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'decant' based on sentences in brown. (from decant.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: and now you learned something today
example.text: [*] Decanting old wine aerates it fully; it may also be -- practically speaking -- a matter of good economy.

example.name: and again
example.text: Thus, red wine must, if possible, never be disturbed or shaken; [very old red wine]-2 is often decanted [*-2]so that the puckering, bitter elements which have settled to the bottom will not be mingled with the wine itself.
example.arg: so that the puckering, bitter elements which have settled to the bottom will not be mingled with the wine itself
